channel.title: Docker on 千舟
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on 千舟

item.title: understand docker network
item.description: the default bridge network tldr create a docker container create a docker compose file to start a redis docker container 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 version: "3" services: redis-lab: image: redis:5.0 container_name: redis-lab ports: - "16379:6379" restart: always launch this container with command 1 docker compose -f redis-lab-compose.yaml up your container has been assigned with a ip you can get your container ip with 1 docker inspect -f '{{range.
